description: Alexa just became an NBA superfan! You can ask her for the statistics of any active NBA player. You can get the averages throughout the season, statistics for a specific game, or the last X games.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask I Know NBA for Kevin Durant stats
Ask I Know NBA for the three points percent of Stephen Curry in his last ten games
Ask I Know NBA for rebounds of Lebron James on march fourth
name: NBA stats by iknow.io
